title: 096 - Post Election Day Special
description: On today's show, the boys chat about which fictional President is the greatest of all-time, discuss their Halloween weekends, Nick graciously accepts an invitation to a jacked up Jeep club, and they go through the Pod FOD and discuss tricksters stealing entire bowls of candy on Halloween and being caught on tape, a couple of kayakers almost getting eaten by a whale, another nail in the movie theaters being dead coffin, Tony delivers a touching ode in remembrance of Sean Connery, Zeet is still battling the hell out of gout, the guys decide whether or not they would take $650,000 if they had to sleep with the main character of the last tv show they watched, and much more. Don't forget to keep sending your submissions into the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and become a member of the McAfee Mafia to watch the show. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you Friday. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
